data.name: [RU] Black Desert – Бесплатный подарочный набор
data.detailed_description:
"Black Desert - FREE Gift Pack" has just been released as free DLC.


Nab the DLC to obtain items that are sure to enrich your adventures.


- Adventurers just starting out in Black Desert will get an outfit for their class and items that provide a variety of buffs. The total value of all the items in this DLC pack is 25USD!



Black Desert - FREE Gift Pack contains the following:

[Products]
- [Event] Treasurable Memories Classic Box x1
- [Event] Blessing of Kamasylve (7 Days) x1
- Inventory +8 Expansion Coupon x1
- Combat & Skill EXP 300% Scroll (60 min) x5
- Advice of Valks (+60) x1

※ [Event] Treasurable Memories Classic Box: Open the box to obtain an outfit suitable for your class.
※ [Event] Blessing of Kamasylve (7 Days): Use this item to get Energy Recovery +2, Item Drop Rate +20% buffs for 7 days.
※ Inventory +8 Expansion Coupon: Use this item to expand the Inventory slots of your character by 8 additional slots. This will allow you to carry even more items.
※ Combat & Skill EXP 300% Scroll (60 min): Use this item to gain a Combat and Skill EXP +300% buff for 60 minutes.
※ Advice of Valks (+60): Use this item to increase your enhancement chance by +60. This increases the probably of your enhancement succeeding.

data.short_description: Experience the vast open world of the Black Desert and immerse yourself in a game that redefines the MMORPG genre with its stunning graphics, skill-based combat, and Siege wars. Adventurers can also explore, fish, tame horses, cook, gather, hunt and so much more in the ultimate MMORPG, Black Desert.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32/64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTS 250 / GeForce 9800GTX Radeon HD 3870 X2
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 32/64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 AMD RX 480
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
